title: HW11 - Caffeine Calculator
description:
HW11 - Caffeine Calculator

Paulina needs at least a certain amount of caffeine. Calculate the minimum volume of coffee needed given the caffeine concentration.

Example:

  • Input: minCaffeine = 100, concentration = 15
    Output: 7
    Explanation: ceil(100/15) = ceil(6.67) = 7 ml

Constraints:

  • Use ceiling function since Paulina needs AT LEAST the minimum
  • Both inputs are positive integers
solution_text:
Caffeine Calculator

Algorithm:

  1. Divide minimum caffeine by concentration
  2. Round up using ceiling function

Time Complexity: O(1) - constant time

Space Complexity: O(1) - constant space
verify:
def verify(actual_output, expected_output):
    """Verify the minimum volume"""
    passed = actual_output == expected_output
    return [passed, str(actual_output)]
